resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-user-about
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - User Profile About
resourceTemplates.description: Get user profile about information. Required: userName.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-user-batch-info-by-ids
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - Batch User Info By IDs
resourceTemplates.description: Get batch user info. Required: userIds (comma-separated user IDs).

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-user-info
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - User Info
resourceTemplates.description: Get user information. Required: userName.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-user-last-tweets
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - User Last Tweets
resourceTemplates.description: Get last tweets by user. Optional: userId, userName, cursor, includeReplies (default false).

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-user-followers
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - User Followers
resourceTemplates.description: Get user followers. Required: userName. Optional: cursor, pageSize (20-200, default 200).

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-user-followings
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - User Followings
resourceTemplates.description: Get user followings. Required: userName. Optional: cursor, pageSize (20-200, default 200).

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-user-mentions
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - User Mentions
resourceTemplates.description: Get mentions for a user. Required: userName. Optional: sinceTime, untilTime, cursor.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-user-check-follow-relationship
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - Check Follow Relationship
resourceTemplates.description: Check follow relationship between users. Required: source_user_name, target_user_name.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-user-search
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - Search Users
resourceTemplates.description: Search users by keyword. Required: query. Optional: cursor.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-user-verified-followers
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - User Verified Followers
resourceTemplates.description: Get verified followers for a user. Required: user_id. Optional: cursor.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-tweets-by-ids
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - Get Tweets By IDs
resourceTemplates.description: Get tweets by IDs. Required: tweet_ids (comma-separated tweet IDs).

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-tweet-replies
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - Tweet Replies
resourceTemplates.description: Get replies for a tweet. Required: tweetId. Optional: cursor.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-tweet-quotes
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - Tweet Quotations
resourceTemplates.description: Get quote tweets for a tweet. Required: tweetId. Optional: cursor.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-tweet-retweeters
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - Tweet Retweeters
resourceTemplates.description: Get retweeters for a tweet. Required: tweetId. Optional: cursor.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-tweet-thread-context
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - Tweet Thread Context
resourceTemplates.description: Get thread context for a tweet. Required: tweetId. Optional: cursor.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-tweet-article
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - Get Article
resourceTemplates.description: Get article by tweet ID. Required: tweet_id.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-tweet-advanced-search
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - Advanced Tweet Search
resourceTemplates.description: Advanced tweet search. Required: query, queryType (Latest or Top). Optional: cursor.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-list-followers
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - List Followers
resourceTemplates.description: Get followers of a list. Required: list_id. Optional: cursor.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-list-members
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - List Members
resourceTemplates.description: Get members of a list. Required: list_id. Optional: cursor.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-community-info
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - Community Info
resourceTemplates.description: Get community information by ID. Required: community_id.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-community-members
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - Community Members
resourceTemplates.description: Get community members. Required: community_id. Optional: cursor.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-community-moderators
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - Community Moderators
resourceTemplates.description: Get community moderators. Required: community_id. Optional: cursor.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-community-tweets
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - Community Tweets
resourceTemplates.description: Get tweets from a community. Required: community_id. Optional: cursor.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-community-search-all
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - Search Tweets From All Communities
resourceTemplates.description: Search tweets from all communities. Required: query, queryType (Latest or Top). Optional: cursor.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-trends
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - Trends
resourceTemplates.description: Get trends by WOEID. Required: woeid. Optional: count (>=30, default 30).

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-twitter-spaces-detail
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Twitter - Space Detail
resourceTemplates.description: Get details of a Twitter Space by ID. Required: space_id.
